name: WooAmoConnector
author: WPCraft

sections.description:
Integration WooCommerce & AmoCRM https://www.amocrm.com/

Features:

  • Sync orders to lead via JSON REST API
  • Simple settings

Links

Sources https://github.com/wpcraft-ru/wooamoconnector

Page https://wpcraft.ru/product/wooamoconnector/

XT version https://wpcraft.ru/product/wooamoconnector-xt/

Issues https://github.com/wpcraft-ru/wooamoconnector/issues
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Settings / AmoCRM and setup
sections.changelog:
1.5

  • fix error with added product to cart

1.4

  • add order items to note

1.3

  • fix fatal error for oldest version WooCommerce

1.2

  • chg meta field for check orders

1.1

  • code refactoring
  • add instructions to settings page
  • add comment for lead in AmoCRM with the order’s data
  • add text domain for localization

1.0

  • bug fixes

0.7.3

  • code refactoring

0.7.2

  • разработка и тестирование новой обертки для API
  • эксперименты с новым функционалом и отдадка работы плагина

0.5

  • Code refactoring
  • Small fixes

0.5

  • init commit
